caveats:
You should add the following to your .bashrc (or .bash_profile):
  if [ -f "/home/tim/.linuxbrew/opt/bash-git-prompt/share/gitprompt.sh" ]; then
    __GIT_PROMPT_DIR="/home/tim/.linuxbrew/opt/bash-git-prompt/share"
    source "/home/tim/.linuxbrew/opt/bash-git-prompt/share/gitprompt.sh"
  fi
desc: Informative, fancy bash prompt for Git users
name: bash-git-prompt
